Name: The Struggle For Pigmote Isle
Description:
The gates of town are closed. Two rodents stand guard. One of them, a rat, is trying to light a cigarette. The other, a guinea-pig, holds the rat's whiskers back from the waxy match flame.

Both yelp as they see you approach. "A thousand apologies, Hairless Adviser, but this is our fight. We must fight it alone." They exchange a nod and escort you respectfully but firmly away from the gate.

DefaultEvent.Name: Squeals in the night
DefaultEvent.Description: You've done all you can. It's up to the rodents now.

ChildBranches.Name: Return to the ship
ChildBranches.Description: It is not safe to be here at the moment. The zee bubbles angrily around the hull. The air crackles with hate.
